credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Jacob H. Schiff
title: Ferdinandes Magalanes Lusitanus, plate 4 from "Americae Retectio"
medium: Engraving on off white laid paper
description: A navigator (Magellan) sits on the prow of the ship, facing left in profile. Sea monsters are visible in the waters at left and right. At right a figure is seated on a rock and forces an arrow down his throat.
name: Print
